Faction-Abilities.Mitosis: Your space docks cannot produce infantry.  At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

Abilities.Special: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system.
DEPLOY: When you would use your MITOSIS faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead.

Bioplasmosis.Ability-Desc: At the end of the status phase , you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

Abilities.Special: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die.  If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card.  At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

Stymie.Desc: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units: You may place 1 command token from that player's reinforcements in any non-home system. Then, return this card to the Arborec player.

Letani Ospha.Ability-Desc: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

Dirzuga Rophal.Unlock-Criteria: Have 12 Ground Forces on Planets you control.
Dirzuga Rophal.Ability-Desc: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.

Letani Miasmiala.Ability-Desc: ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces.
